entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then a few showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 19 April 2023
